benchmark_details.name: ChatPHP-DB (AI-generated PHP website dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: This dataset consists of 2,500 standalone PHP programs generated by LLMs with accompanying init.sql files, classified based on vulnerabilities identified through scans. It aims to evaluate the security of LLM-generated PHP code.
benchmark_details.data_type: PHP code with accompanying SQL files

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the secure coding capabilities of GPT-4 in generating PHP code and to identify vulnerabilities in such code.

data.source: Publicly available LLM-generated PHP code and accompanying SQL files created using GPT-4.
data.annotation: Classified based on vulnerabilities through active scans, static scans, and manual verification.

methodology.calculation: Calculated by counting the number of identified vulnerabilities through scans and manual auditing.
methodology.interpretation: A higher number of vulnerabilities indicated poor security in LLM-generated PHP code.
methodology.validation: Validated through a combination of dynamic and static scans alongside manual code audits.
